articles.description: Heavyweight boxing legend Mike Tyson won’t be charged for delivering a beatdown to a fellow airline passenger in an incident that was caught on video and went viral last month. San Mateo County District Attorney Steve Wagstaffe said the decision was made in p…
articles.content:
Heavyweight boxing legend Mike Tyson wont be charged for delivering a beatdown to a fellow airline passenger in an incident that was caught on video and went viral last month.
